hanzi-su-wiki:
遅

Значения

Опаздывать, отставать; замедлять; поздний, медленный

Мнемоника

  • Як, как и овца 羊, покрыт длинной шерстью, пригоден для езды, сидя 尸 верхом, но медлителен и движется 辶 не спеша. Медленный, прибывать с опозданием.

  • "Одна из овец отстала и пришла поздно."

Варианты

遲, 迟

遅遅RSlate, tardy, slow, delay

遲
koohiiStory1: A sheep crossing guard waves a SLOW flag for his fellow sheep crossing the road.
koohiiStory2: Road sign (flag): "Sheep on highway! Drive slowly.".
kunYomi: おく.れる、おく.らす、おそ.い
jp_example_words:
遅らす(おくらす): to retard, to delay
遅れ(おくれ): delay, lag
遅くとも(おそくとも): at the latest
手遅れ(ておくれ): too late, belated treatment
遅刻(ちこく): lateness, late coming
遅れる(おくれる): to be late
遅い(おそい): late, slow
jp_readingExamples: 遅らす (おく.らす), 遅れる (おく.れる), 遅い (おそ.い)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Next to the scooter, there's a flag warning you that there are sheep around here, so you should go slow.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It's also a warning to the sheep that if they want to ride scooters they should also slow down, because as we all know, sheep are speed demons.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You follow the flag, but the sheep refuse to slow down so you have to get creative. You place cheese (ち) every ten feet or so, that way the sheep slow down to bend down on their scooters and take a bite.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture all of the sheep finally going slowly because there is yummy cheese all over the road.
Ru_Radicals: 并, 込 (внутрь), 尸 (труп), 王 (монарх), 羊 (овца)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the sheep (羊) would be a corpse (尸) if it moves (⻌) late

遅字的基本解释

遅
chí
古同“迟”。

遅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chí］
［《廣韻》直尼切，平脂，澄。］
“迟1”的繁体字。亦作“赿1”。亦作“迡1”。亦作“遅1”。亦作“遟1”。
(1)徐行。
(2)缓慢。
(3)晚。
(4)久。
(5)迟钝。
(6)迟疑，犹豫。
(7)迟留；逗留。
(8)废置；停滞；不通畅。
(9)中医学名词。脉象之一。指脉搏缓慢，一呼一吸的时间内跳三下，即每分钟跳六十次以下的脉搏。
(10)通“犀”。参见“遲利”。
(11)通“治”。芟除。
(12)姓。汉有迟昭平。见《汉书·王莽传下》。
[②]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直利切，去至，澄。］
“迟2”的繁体字。亦作“遟2”。
(1)等待。
(2)比及，等到。
(3)想望，希望。
(4)接待，招待。
(5)副词。乃。

遅字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遅； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1261第05
同遲。

遅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
遅字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
遅
chí
Gu Tong is "late".
遅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chí］
["Guangyun" Zhiniqie, flat fat, clear. ]
The traditional characters of "Chi 1". Also known as "赿1". Also known as "迡1". Also known as "Yu 1". Also known as "Yun 1".
(1) Xu Xing.
(2) Slow.
(3) Late.
(4) Long time.
(5) Sluggishness.
(6) Hesitation, hesitation.
(7) Stay late; stay.
(8) Abolition; stagnation; obstruction.
(9) Chinese medical terms. One of the pulse conditions. Refers to the slow pulse, which beats three times within the time of one breath and one breath, that is, the pulse beats less than 60 times per minute.
(10) Through "Rhinoceros". See "Chili".
(11) Through "governance". In addition to.
(12) Last name. Han You Chi Zhaoping. See "Han Shu·Wang Mang's Passage".
[②]［zhì］
["Guangyun" is straightforward and sharp, go to, and clear. ]
"Chi 2" in traditional characters. Also known as "Yun 2".
(1) Wait.
(2) Compare and wait till.
(3) Hope, hope.
(4) Reception and entertainment.
(5) Adverbs. Is.
遅

[You Ji 2] [辵字部] 　遅; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1261 05
The same late.

chí
яп. вм. 迟

遅

Значения

Опаздывать, отставать; замедлять; поздний, медленный

Мнемоника

  • Як, как и овца 羊, покрыт длинной шерстью, пригоден для езды, сидя 尸 верхом, но медлителен и движется 辶 не спеша. Медленный, прибывать с опозданием.

  • "Одна из овец отстала и пришла поздно."

Варианты

遲, 迟

Radicals: 尸, 羊  (flag, sheep, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
Next to the scooter, there's a flag warning you that there are sheep around here, so you should go slow.
It's also a warning to the sheep that if they want to ride scooters they should also slow down, because as we all know, sheep are speed demons.
Reading Mnemonic
You follow the flag, but the sheep refuse to slow down so you have to get creative. You place cheese (ち) every ten feet or so, that way the sheep slow down to bend down on their scooters and take a bite.
Picture all of the sheep finally going slowly because there is yummy cheese all over the road.
